channel.title: Get 'Perfect' ring into ring spot?
channel.description: fr33sc4p3 source. I took the perfect ring out of the shop...then when I used pickup it and tried to wield it would go as a weapon. Any idea how to fix so that it 1hits people and stays in ring spot?

item.title: Get 'Perfect' ring into ring spot?
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

So you want the ring to be used for “1 hit kills”? But you know if you do this then it will be bad cause an admin or mod that has the ring will get killed one time and then the ring will be out for the normal players then your screwed cause you don’t know who has the RING you wanted. So it bad if you do that.

Read full topic

item.title: Get 'Perfect' ring into ring spot?
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

kilermage3:

yes go to item.java and find the weapon slot and get the perfect rings id which is 773 or something like that, just take it out of the weapon slot, now if it not there then I can’t help.

Any way to do so it 1 hit’s people…?Because it isn’t right now[br][size=1]Posted on: May 13, 2007, 12:53:18 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Fenam, post:4, topic:94182”]Fr33Sc4p3 default source the perfect ring is +1 all stats. You’ll need to edit that to somewhere between 10000-100000 to guarantee a “1 hit kill”[/quote]

Where is that?

Read full topic

item.title: Get 'Perfect' ring into ring spot?
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

But having 1 hit kill is like retarded. So thats why I took out the ring from the servers I created.

item.title: Get 'Perfect' ring into ring spot?
item.dc:creator: @Fenam Fenam
item.description:
@Fenam wrote:

Fr33Sc4p3 default source the perfect ring is +1 all stats. You’ll need to edit that to somewhere between 10000-100000 to guarantee a “1 hit kill”

Read full topic

Open item.java

search for

0733

i think 0733 is the code …

delete that

find

the weapon thing and add it…
